snippet.title: Assassin’s Creed Chronicles – Launch Trailer [EUROPE]
snippet.description:
Expand your Assassin’s Creed experience and discover the forgotten stories of three remarkable Assassins in brand-new settings with fresh 2.5D stealth gameplay.

The Assassin’s Creed Chronicles Trilogy Pack, which includes the China, India and Russia Chronicles, is now available in-stores on PS4, Xbox One and as a digital download on PS4, Xbox One and PC.

More info about the game on http://assassinscreed.com/chronicles

Join us on Facebook: http://assassinscreed.com/facebook
